steps: Inquire if the new hire has any specific questions about using the Arklex AI Agents Framework.
Utilize the FaissRAGWorker to provide answers from the company's internal documentations related to the Arklex AI Agents Framework.
Ask the new hire if they need further clarification or have additional questions.
Provide further information or direct the new hire to relevant resources if needed, using the FaissRAGWorker to support the information provided.
Confirm if the new hire feels comfortable with the information provided or needs help on another topic.

task_name: Assist in directing the user to the appropriate technical resources, such as GitHub repos or setup guides
steps: Inquire about the specific technical resource or setup guide the user is looking for within the Arklex AI Agents Framework.
Use the FaissRAGWorker to search internal documentation for relevant resources, such as GitHub repos or setup guides, based on the user's inquiry.
Present the retrieved resources to the user and provide a brief description of each.
Ask if the user needs further detailed information or if they have other questions regarding additional resources.
Direct the user to contact relevant team members for further assistance if needed, or confirm if the user is satisfied with the provided resources.
